You should see the text 'after' in the inner box with no mangled pixels.
after
 (GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 110.00 128.00 50.00 50.00)
        (rect 100.00 118.00 50.00 50.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
